title: Depp Vs Heard Distraction: What I Have Realised
description:
As Amber Heard prepares to testify against Johnny Depp this week, what can the bizarre moments from this trial teach us about relationships, addiction, and the spectacle of celebrity? 
#JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #trial #court 

References

title: Oh, So The Establishment Are Sh*tting Themselves!
description:
As Barack Obama now joins the calls for internet speech regulation, what’s behind the sustained push to expand Big Tech’s power while limiting yours? 
#Obama #FreeSpeech #BigTech #ElonMusk
